title: Combined oxidation and in-situ coagulation in iron-activated sulfite process for tribromophenol removal in actual water matrix
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00368C, Paper
Fan Bai, Zongping Wang, Guodong Wan, Lisan Cao, Yujie Cheng, Zhenbin Chen, Pengchao Xie
In this study, Fe(III)/sulfite (S(IV)) system was used to treat two actual water samples including a lake water sample and a secondary sedimentation tank effluent sample containing tribromophenol (TBP) with...
